trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Woodbridge
There was one other sighting in Woodbridge on or around September 17th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsI was putting trash out and noticed how bright the moon was tonight, turned around go back toward the house and I looked South West just over some trees and there was one of the brightest things I have ever seen siting there. I just stood there for awhile in amazement. To the right of this object was a dim star. I immediately ran in the house to get someone to make sure I wasnt hollusonating. They were also as amazed as I. The object made no noise. It was beautiful. Hopefully it wasn't anything bad. We brought out the camera but the Orb had went too far below the trees to catch it. Will be more prepared if theres a next time.
Summary: Orb was extremely bright, brighter than the full moon tonight. It was amazing. NOT man made, no sound eventually went below trees. WOW!
